food_entries.title: Cheese Burger
food_entries.content: The Hamburger Wendy’s Burger is a classic fast food burger that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a juicy beef patty cooked to perfection, it’s topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, rie tomato, and crunchy pickles.

food_entries.title: Hamburger
food_entries.content: The Hamburger Wendy’s Burger is a classic.
